system.description: When you hit with a melee weapon attack, you can use your channel divinity to curse the wound (no action required). The target of the attack takes an additional 1d8 necrotic damage and must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. If the target fails, it cannot regain hit points until it finishes a long rest. If it succeeds, its maximum hit points are reduced by an amount equal to the damage done by your attack until it finishes a long rest.
